name: @ander__h8446
comment:
The worst thing is they call them "tactical fouls" and most football followers accept them, "as long as it's not red card, or even if it is, it's better that than loosing". Like what the actual fuck. Even the trainers encourage their players to commit themğŸ¤®ğŸ¤®

For me this is fucking disgusting,dangerous for the players (their career can literaly end and and have serious injuries), and an insult to sportmanship and fair play. 

Me myself have an anckle sprain just because of a fucking random guy, who could be my father, who commited a "technical foul" on me just because I'm good (i had scored already 2 goals, both nutmeging the keeper by the way)

IT'S NOT FAIR

By the way I'm a referee now and at the minimal foul like this I swear, it can be technically a yellow card, but if it's done out of the blue and without justification I will pull red card. Don't care if I loose my job or am critizised. Sportmanship above all, in football as well. You can change thing like that maybe, or the other way from the inside, reaching the high spheres of refereeing and changing rules.ğŸ¤· the second one seems less plausible so I'll just take justice in my own hands.
author: @ander__h8446
